name: Administrators
description: Full system administrators with complete access

name: Viewers
description: Read-only access to dashboards and data

name: Editors
description: Can edit dashboards and create new ones

name: Family
description: Family members with limited access to media and basic monitoring

name: Guests
description: Temporary access for visitors

name: Developers
description: Development team with access to development and testing dashboards

name: Security
description: Security team with access to security monitoring and alerts

name: Media
description: Media management team with access to media stack dashboards

name: Backup
description: Backup management team with access to backup and storage dashboards

name: Monitoring
description: Monitoring team with access to all monitoring dashboards

name: Network
description: Network team with access to network infrastructure dashboards

name: Storage
description: Storage team with access to storage and filesystem dashboards

name: Database
description: Database team with access to database monitoring dashboards

name: Containers
description: Container team with access to container orchestration dashboards

name: Logs
description: Logs team with access to log aggregation and analysis dashboards

name: Alerts
description: Alert team with access to alert management dashboards

name: Performance
description: Performance team with access to performance monitoring dashboards

name: Documentation
description: Documentation team with access to documentation dashboards

name: Home Automation
description: Home automation team with access to IoT and automation dashboards

name: Gaming
description: Gaming team with access to gaming server dashboards
